game.name: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, Steam Cloud, 통계, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café is a cozy and relaxing decoration and rhythm game where you manage a café and befriend cute animals.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café is a cozy and relaxing decoration and rhythm game where you manage a café and befriend cute animals.
